iris.train
==========

.. py:module:: iris.train


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   iris.train.Model


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Model(test_size=0.5)

   Class that contains a KNN model to classify iris dataset from sklearn.

   .. method:: __init__ - initializes the model by training it on the iris dataset.

      

   .. method:: __call__ - takes a list of data records and returns the predicted labels.

      

   .. method:: _init_data - loads the iris dataset, defines the features and labels, and splits the data into training and evaluation sets.

      

   .. method:: _score - calculates the accuracy score of the model on the evaluation data.

      

   .. method:: _train - trains the KNeighborsClassifier model on the training data.

      
      


   .. py:attribute:: dataset
      :value: 'iris'



   .. py:attribute:: architecture
      :value: 'KNN'



   .. py:method:: __call__(data)


   .. py:method:: _init_data(test_size=0.5)


   .. py:method:: _score()


   .. py:method:: _train(test_size=0.5)
